hero.name: Amal Sharma
hero.tagline: I’m a Web Developer My passion is to create and develop clean Websites for my users. Currently, I’m looking for new opportunities in Web Development.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a Web Developer proficient in MERN stack. I have built several projects based on REACT, Express.js for Frontend and Backend implementation. I’m seeking a role where I can continue to grow and make an impact.
about.technologies: Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with recently:

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: I’m currently looking for a Web Developer role. My inbox is always open. Whether you are interested in my profile, have a question or just want to say hi. Feel free to reach out.
